name: Foreign World
description:
You're an alien and you've crash landed onto some strange planet of slimes and flies and you've been thrown way from your ship!

Collect gems to get through the doors and make your way back to your ship!

WASD to move and jump

LShift to shoot fireballs

Move into the direction of certain walls to wall jump!

Script Repository Right Here: https://github.com/PapaLeviathan/Foreign-World
